ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono SMS summary plots of ion count rates
ResourceHeader.Description:
These data consist of plots of color-coded ion 
count rates vs. spin phase angle and time, for thermal H+, He++, 
He+ and O+ ions and for suprathermal H+ and O+ ions.  Each plot 
covers some or all of one ~3.5 hour orbit.  Digital binary data
and a data reading program are also accessible.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono SMS data were provided 
by A.W. Yau through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement:
In any publications, the use of the Akebono data 
should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided 
by A.W. Yau through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, 
JAXA in Japan."
